instruction: Using the given example, frame a multiple choice question.
input: False Belief: It is not possible to switch from a Major to a Minor in the same semester.
output:
Which one of the following statements is not true? 
A. You can switch from a Major to a Minor within the same semester. 
B. It is impossible to switch from a Major to a Minor within the same semester. 
C. It is possible to switch from a Minor to a Major within the same semester. 
D. It is unlikely to switch from a Minor to a Major within the same semester.
